I visited Hakkari Mountain and Commando Brigade twice during my presidency and I became her guest of the hero, Mehmet, one night.
I curse the treacherous terrorist attack on our soldiers who are working to ensure the security of the people in the geographically difficult region.
I wish mercy from Allah to our soldiers who are martyred in Dağlıca 's menace, I wish for immediate healing.
I would like to express condolences to our martyrs' families, to the supreme nationality and to our armed forces.
It is clear that the sole purpose of these treacherous attacks is to disrupt the unity and unity of our country.
I invite our people to refrain from behaviors that would harm our brotherhood and our unity while revealing their rightful reaction to terrorism.

PM: It's absolutely right that Britain fulfils its moral responsibility to help #Syria refugees
PM: But we must use our head and our heart with a comprehensive approach that tackles the causes of the problem as well as the consequences
PM: Last week we announced a further £100 million in aid for conflict in #Syria, taking our total contribution to over £1 billion
PM: We are proposing that Britain should resettle up to 20,000 Syrian refugees over the rest of this Parliament #Syria
PM: We'll show the world that Britain is a country of extraordinary compassion - standing up for our values and helping those in need.

Today, our police officers who were martyred in the treacherous terrorist attack in Iğdır branded ourselves.

I wish all our martyrs mercy from Allah, their painful families, our Police Department and our condolence to all the nations.

Turkey is our common life, our common happiness, our common past, our common future.
Until today, Turkey, which has succeeded in coming from the tops of the nasty little ones, will also solve the divisive terror affair.
Our struggle is only against terrorism.
As a citizen, we have fulfilled the responsibilities that fall on our provinces, never coming to provocations.
I ask that our citizens protect their common sense and fortitude during the fight against terrorism.
